dia.en: That is the door.
It's very locked. No chance of escape without the key.
They look dangerous!
How?
They look dangerous! Even broken.
How?
They look dangerous! Even broken.
How?
They look really dangerous!
Out of reach.
I love that song. I think it was by Gabrielle.
The cover by Nine Inch Nails was better.
It's a metal cover on the floor.
How?
It's too far away.
It's too far away
It's a metal cover on the floor.
It looks like the water is draining away that way.
Not quick enough though. You're going to die!
How?
It's too far away.
It's too far away
It's a metal cover on the floor.
It's been perforated by the big spiky thing
How?
It's too far away.
It's too far away
It's a pile of wooden creates.
They are a fire hazzard.
How?
It's a pile of wooden creates.
They are a fire hazzard.
How?
It's a pile of wooden crates.
They are a fire hazard.
How?
It's my girlfriend.
Well, lets say ex-girlfriend since she is trying to kill me.
Hi Sarah
Not again!
I know what you are doing Sarah!
It's my girlfriend.
Well, lets say ex-girlfriend since she is trying to kill me.
What just happened?
I just knocked you out and chained you to a wall.
Why?
So I had time to prepare.
What for?
To kill you. My weapons system wasn't plugged in.
You are going to kill me?

Yeah, well last night when you came, I implanted a chip in your brain to make you forget everything and try and throw you off remembering what you found out, but clearly that didn't work! So I'll just have to kill you.
I don't think you need to do that.
Yes I do.
<ring>
Hold on, phone call. I won't keep you long.
It's my girlfriend.
Well, lets say ex-girlfriend since she is trying to kill me.
Hi Sarah
Not again!
This looks like the ones at Future Tech. It even has the slot for a digital thing.
There are some phone numbers scribbled on a note pad.
This one sounds weird, Weapons: 555-Kill-Ted
There is no dial tone.
It fits.
This looks like the ones at Future Tech. It even has the slot for a digital thing.
Fob
It's not nice to call people names.
No, the digital thing, it's called a Fob.
I don't know, the one truthful thing I say and you choose then to have a go at me.
There are some phone numbers scribbled on a note pad.
This one sounds weird, Weapons: 555-Kill-Ted
Wow that is very spiky. I wonder what it's for?
Killing nosy boyfriends.
How?
Wow that is very spiky. I wonder what it's for?
Killing nosy boyfriends.
I bet if I could dislodge that it would break that drain cover.
Maybe I have something in my pockets that I can use.
Yeah, throw that oxygen cylinder
It might explode and kill me!
It's a risk I suppose.
Not one I'm prepared to take.
It does look very precarious though, I think even a balloon would displace it.
How?
Wow that is very spiky. I wonder what it's for?
Killing nosy boyfriends.
How?
That fire is going to reach me soon, I better do something about that! And fast!
ON WHAT? DO SOMETHING SENSIBLE!
Try stamping on it.
Look I know you are an implant to confuse me, we have determined that it doesn't work. NOW SHUT UP!
I'm not throwing explosives at a fire!
Did you never see the public service announcements?
That fire is going to reach me soon, I better do something about that! And fast!
ON WHAT? DO SOMETHING SENSIBLE!
Try stamping on it.
Look I know you are an implant to confuse me, we have determined that it doesn't work. NOW SHUT UP!
I'm not throwing explosives at a fire!
Did you never see the public service announcements?
That fire is going to reach me soon, I better do something about that! And fast!
ON WHAT? DO SOMETHING SENSIBLE!
Try stamping on it.
Look I know you are an implant to confuse me, we have determined that it doesn't work. NOW SHUT UP!
I'm not throwing explosives at a fire!
Did you never see the public service announcements?
That fire is going to reach me soon, I better do something about that! And fast!
ON WHAT? DO SOMETHING SENSIBLE!
Try stamping on it.
Look I know you are an implant to confuse me, we have determined that it doesn't work. NOW SHUT UP!
I'm not throwing explosives at a fire!
Did you never see the public service announcements?
That fire is going to reach me soon, I better do something about that! And fast!
ON WHAT? DO SOMETHING SENSIBLE!
Try stamping on it.
Look I know you are an implant to confuse me, we have determined that it doesn't work. NOW SHUT UP!
I'm not throwing explosives at a fire!
Did you never see the public service announcements?
It's a book
It's too far to reach.
No it isn't!
Are you talking to yourself again?
It's a book
It's a pipe.
How?
It's a pipe.
Just give in, it will be easier.
How?
I really hope I don't miss and this works, or I'm burnt toast.
Very clever! Now you are going to drown, makes no difference to me.
Just as well I can hold my breath for n minutes where n is an infeasibly high number.
Let me guess, is n equal to 10?
No, any adventure game character can manage 10 minutes!
Talking to yourself again?
I really hope I don't miss and this works, or I'm burnt toast.
Very clever! Now you are going to drown, makes no difference to me.
I might need that.
It's a pipe.
How?
It's a pile of wooden crates.
They are a fire hazard.
How?
It's a pile of wooden crates.
They are a fire hazard.
How?
It's a pile of wooden crates.
They are a fire hazard.
How?
It's a pile of wooden crates.
They are a fire hazard.
How?
It's a pile of wooden crates.
They are a fire hazard.
How?
It's a pile of wood.
They are a fire hazard.
How?
I'm handcuffed to the wall.
Some people would pay good money for that. Stop complaining.
On what?
I'll try to pick the lock.
Nope!
It's doesn't fit.
It's a squib
Some look dangerously close to that fire!
Stop trying to build up the tension, they'll never explode, and it will all be a damp squib.
It's a damp squib
It's too far
It's a squib
Some look dangerously close to that fire!
Stop trying to build up the tension, they'll never explode, and it will all be a damp squib.
It's too far
It's a squib

Stop trying to build up the tension, they'll never explode, and it will all be a damp squib.
It's a damp squib

title.en: I don't know what to do.

dia.en: I don't know what to do.
Self Destruct
Attack Sarah.
Invalid target.
Attack Sarah
Fail safe system offline. Default action: Follow order.

title.en: I don't want to use this after all.

dia.en: I don't want to use this after all.
Phone the weapon system.
<ring>
Phone the weapon system.
On what number?

title.en: Are you really going to kill me? After everything we've been through?

dia.en: Are you really going to kill me? After everything we've been through?
Yeah, why not? You know too much. It's me or you, honey. In fact, I should probably start that.
Weapons systems! Kill Dr Ted Martin!
Hmm, I guess it needs calibrating. I'll just do that.

title.en: Please don't kill me! I promise I won't tell anyone!

dia.en: Please don't kill me! I promise I won't tell anyone!
Sorry, I don't trust you.
Bye
Yes
But you aren't going to tell me are you?
Of course not.
No
Fine you've gone crazy. I still need to kill you though.
Give up.
Never. Give me a moment, I'll think of something!
Weapon systems! Kill Dr Ted Martin!
Great the microphone is broken! This is all your fault! Why did you never support me in my decisions? I just wanted to be a better woman!
Use your manibles!
Just as well you're only in my head.
What? Did your implant just say something to you?

title.en: Enough hints on the broken phone

dia.en: Enough hints on the broken phone
Hint
Look through your inventory, maybe you will remember
Bigger hint
I'm not fobbing you off, honest.

title.en: Just tell me what to do!

dia.en: Just tell me what to do!
Use the digital fob on the phone
Enough hints on the fire.
Hint
Is there anything around that might provide water?
Bigger hint
That pipe won't have a man-eating plant come out of it.

title.en: I can't reach the pipe, what do I do?

dia.en: I can't reach the pipe, what do I do?
Throw something heavy at it.

title.en: Just tell me what to do!

dia.en: Just tell me what to do!
Use the intervene book on the pipe
I hope it doesn't make things worse for you!
Enough hints on me drowning
Hint
You need to drain all the water away

title.en: How do I drain the water away?

dia.en: How do I drain the water away?
How about opening that drain
Shame you can't reach it

title.en: How do I open the drain?

dia.en: How do I open the drain?
Maybe you could dislodge that big spiky thing
Shame it's not possible to throw things underwater
Another hint
Do you have anything that floats
Or maybe you could make something that floats

title.en: Just tell me what to do!

dia.en: Just tell me what to do!
Use the O2 tank on the scrubs to make a bouy.
If you are in luck, it will hit the spiky thing as it shoots to the surface

title.en: I don't need any more of your sticking help.

dia.en: I don't need any more of your sticking help.
Hint
Maybe you can use Sarah's weapon system against her

title.en: How do I operate the weapons system?

dia.en: How do I operate the weapons system?
I'm sure I saw a book on that
Another Hint
The book said you could phone it

title.en: What is the number for the weapons system?

dia.en: What is the number for the weapons system?
Maybe Sarah wrote it down somewhere
Check the book
Or the phone

title.en: Just tell me what to do!

dia.en: Just tell me what to do!
Examine the phone and the book
Then use the phone and call the weapons system
No More Help Please
Help I can't move!
Have a look around, there must be something you can examine or pick up.
Maybe you can convince Sarah not to kill you?
The phone won't work
I'm sure we had that problem with another phone

title.en: I just don't know what to do with myself

dia.en: I just don't know what to do with myself
Have you spoken to anyone about that?

title.en: How do I put the fire out?

dia.en: How do I put the fire out?
Have you tried water or a fire extingusher?
Help I'm drowning
Don't panic, you can hold your breath for like 10 minutes

title.en: I don't know what to do

dia.en: I don't know what to do
You're so close.
